mapper.sql: id, product_name AS productName, product_orgin_price AS productOrginPrice, product_now_price AS productNowPrice, product_num AS productNum, post_price AS postPrice, recommend_brand AS recommendBrand, sell_num AS sellNum, remain_num AS remainNum, product_dec AS productDec, sort_id AS sortId, scope_id AS scopeId, sort, remark, create_date AS createDate, create_user AS createUser, update_date AS updateDate, update_user AS updateUser, deleteFlag, recommend_boutique AS recommendBoutique
mapper.select: SELECT sp.id, sp.product_name, sp.product_now_price, sp.product_orgin_price, spf.file_path as file_path FROM wwq_product AS sp LEFT JOIN wwq_product_file AS spf ON sp.id = spf.product_id and spf.file_type = 0 LEFT JOIN wwq_sort as ss1 on ss1.id = sp.sort_id WHERE sp.deleteFlag = 0 and spf.deleteFlag = 0 and ss1.id = #{sortId}

SELECT sp.id, sp.product_name, sp.product_now_price, sp.product_orgin_price, sp.create_date, spf.file_path as file_path FROM wwq_product AS sp LEFT JOIN wwq_product_file AS spf ON sp.id = spf.product_id and spf.file_type = 0 WHERE sp.deleteFlag = 0 and spf.deleteFlag = 0
and sp.recommend_boutique=1
and sp.recommend_brand=1

SELECT sp.id, sp.product_name, sp.product_now_price, sp.product_orgin_price, spf.file_path as file_path FROM wwq_product AS sp LEFT JOIN wwq_product_file AS spf ON sp.id = spf.product_id WHERE sp.deleteFlag = 0 and spf.deleteFlag = 0 and sp.product_name like CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%')

SELECT wp.id,wp.`product_name`, wpf.file_path as file_path, wp.`product_dec`,wp.`product_orgin_price` , wp.`product_now_price`, wp.`sell_num`, wp.`remain_num`, wp.`post_price`, wp.product_type FROM `wwq_product` as wp LEFT JOIN `wwq_product_file` as wpf on wpf.`product_id` = wp.`id` and wpf.`deleteFlag` =0 and wpf.`file_type` = 0 where wp.id =#{id} and wp.`deleteFlag` =0
select * from wwq_product where id = #{id} and deleteFlag = 0

SELECT p.id, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_orgin_price AS productOrginPrice, p.product_now_price AS productNowPrice, p.product_num AS productNum, p.post_price AS postPrice, p.recommend_brand AS recommendBrand, p.sell_num AS sellNum, p.remain_num AS remainNum, p.product_dec AS productDec, p.sort_id AS sortId, p.scope_id AS scopeId, p.sort, p.remark, p.create_date AS createDate, p.create_user AS createUser, p.update_date AS updateDate, p.update_user AS updateUser, p.deleteFlag, p.recommend_boutique AS recommendBoutique, p.product_type as productType, pd.id as detailId,pd.post_way_id as postWayId,pd.delivery_area_id as deliveryAreaId,pd.remark as detailRemark FROM wwq_product p left join wwq_product_detail pd on p.id=pd.shop_product_id left join wwq_sort s on s.id=p.sort_id where 1=1 and p.id = #{id} and p.deleteFlag = 0

SELECT p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,p.product_orgin_price as productOrginPrice, p.product_now_price as productNowPrice,p.sell_num as sellNum, p.remain_num as remainNum,p.product_num as productNum,p.product_dec as productDec,p.product_type as productType, s.name as sortName,pd.id as detailId FROM wwq_product p left join wwq_product_detail pd on p.id=pd.shop_product_id left join wwq_sort s on s.id=p.sort_id where 1=1
and p.product_name like '%${productName}%'
and p.deleteFlag = 0 order by p.create_date desc
